usage: Instructions and transformation rules for converting .sharedparse XML files into Java fixed-length format POJO classes.
description: Steps to convert Tibco BusinessWorks .sharedparse files to Java POJO classes for fixed-length format handling

annotations: @FixedLengthRecord with pos, length, padding and optional alignment configuration

configuration_mapping.FormatType: Determines that it is Fixed format based record processing strategy

input_example.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<BWSharedResource xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
    <name>GetAccountDataFormat</name>
    <resourceType>ae.shared.ParseSharedResource</resourceType>
    <config xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
        <FormatType>Fixed format</FormatType>
        <ColumnSeparator>,</ColumnSeparator>
        <ColSeparatorRule>Treat all characters as entered as a single column separator string</ColSeparatorRule>
        <LineSeparator>
</LineSeparator>
        <FillCharacter>Space</FillCharacter>
        <LineLength>38</LineLength>
        <OffsetString>RecordType(0,1)
AccountNumber(1,18)
TransactionId(18,38)
</OffsetString>
        <DataFormat>
            <xsd:element name="Format">
                <xsd:complexType>
                    <xsd:sequence>
                        <xsd:element name="RecordType" type="xsd:string"/>
                        <xsd:element name="AccountNumber" type="xsd:string"/>
                        <xsd:element name="TransactionId" type="xsd:string"/>
                    </xsd:sequence>
                </xsd:complexType>
            </xsd:element>
        </DataFormat>
    </config>
</BWSharedResource>

output_example.framework: Spring Boot with Apache Camel Bindy

key_elements.name: Source for class naming
key_elements.DataFormat: XSD elements for field dataTypes and optional/mandatory cardinality

special_considerations: Default padding character is space unless specified
Field alignment defaults to left unless configured
